name: Climb out of agony
description: This "game" was made for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Jam. I know that it probably looks like it was made in about an hour, but this took me *well* over 30 hours, while incorporating multiple bugs into gameplay, instead of fixing them. This is the first project that I actually finished in some form and maybe I'll update it down the line to reflect my idea a bit better. But for now; I'm done.
